" Google Inc. was a small company," Eric Schmidt remembered. Having come through the bruising browser wars, I didn't want to do that again. So Sergey Brin and Page hired some ex-Firefox developers and had them build a prototype. 2011 Earlier this week "The X Factor"s Simon Cowell confessed that he is a "massive fan of Paula Abdul ." On Tuesday night Paula Abdul told Jay Leno that she felt that was an understatement. I think you need to take "mass' off and put` obsessive,' said Paula Abdul when asked about her thoughts on Simon Cowell 's comment. The singer then clarified, "He"s obsessed with me."
